name: mycred-gb-blocks/mycred-total-pts
title: Total Points
description: Displays the total points accumulated based on filters like user, reference, and reference ID.

type.description: The point type to add up.

ref.description: Filter results based on a single reference or a list of references.

ref_id.description: Option to filter results based on a reference ID.

user_id.description: Specify the user ID for point accumulation. Use 'current' for the current user.

formatted.description: Show results formatted with prefix/suffix or plain format.
